modName: Extra Blades - Recruit More Allies to Your Army
summary: A simple mod that allows 10 NPC\'s to join the Blades. Tested and working! ;)
descriptionHtml:
A simple mod that allows 10 followers to be recruited by the Blades. 

Tested and working with the latest game updates! ;)

Release date: Mar.29.2012





>>> NOTES <<<


* This mod was made from scratch and it is not compatible with other Blades\' mods avaible here.
* This is only a gameplay/quest mod and won\'t mess up with Skyhaven Temple. If you\'d like to have an improved Temple, try out [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11750]this mod[/url] instead (by ItsMeToo).
* This works great even if you already recruited the three standard Blades (as long as you didn\'t start Esbern\'s dragon hunting quest).
* During the dragon hunting quests, only the first three Blades recruited will fight along with you.





>>> Please endorse this file if you find it useful - support the community. <<<
author: observantt
